Header: Army Experts on Agriculture Educate Jaffna Troops
Content: An awareness workshop to stimulate the value of cultivation and educate the troops on the importance of growing own vegetables, fruits, flowers, herbal plants, rare creepers, etc was held for troops under command to  Divisions, Brigades, Battalions and Training schools of the Security Forces Headquarters Jaffna during 6-7 November  at the SFHQ-J auditorium. This programme was conducted on the guidelines given by the Commander of the Army Lieutenant General Shavendra Silva and with the blessings of the Jaffna Commander. Officers from the Directorate of Agriculture and Livestock conducted lectures and practicals related to gardening and garden beautification.
